body.content:
Greetings Dear,

My name is Norbert Parpan, a Legal practitioner. I apologize for contacting
you in this manner but the situation at hand demands urgent attention from
all presumed beneficiaries. I have an important subject to share with you,
regarding my late client Martin, a nationality of your country who has the
same last name as you inheritance funds in his bank. Write back for more
details.

Regards,
Norbert Parpan.
